title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request.
EB: The progress dialog should honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. When calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass false for the cancelable parameter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open the software. 2) Add an exception breakpoint. 3) Cancel the operation. Observe that the progress dialog closes immediately, and the exception list appears despite the cancellation request.
